global.title: Steakeye - Expert Front End Development Services
global.metaDescription: Steakeye Ltd. provides expert front-end development services.

content.title: About
content.body: Steakeye Ltd., is the vehicle of Andrew Keats, a Senior Front-end Developer with over a decade of experience building client-side websites and applications. Prior to forming Steakeye, Andrew's experience was of e-commerce within an agency setting, delivering projects for a  multitude of leading high street retail outlets. In the 9 years since starting Steakeye, the variety of project work has spanned many industries such as B2B retail, Customer Loyalty, On-demand Video, Government Services, Shipping, and e-Commerce. Andrew also has FinTech experience. Happy in a full-stack environment, Andrew also has experience and qualifications in both design and UX; all of this brings a strong set of skills to any cross-functional team, especially those in need of mentoring or leadership.
